## ni output get

Get a value that a previous task stored

### Synopsis

Get a value that a previous task stored

```
ni output get
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for get
      --json               whether to always provide the output as JSON, even if it is a string
  -k, --key string         the output key
  -n, --task-name string   the name of the task
```
